item.title: Python: Hello World With Prime Numbers
item.description: Please note that this is simply for fun and learning purposes.

item.title: The Birthday Paradox
item.description: Suppose there’s a party of N people. How many people do you think it takes to find a pair of people who have the same birthdays?

item.title: Making a Biased Penny Fair
item.description: Definitions: Fair penny: This type of penny has a 50/50 chance of landing on heads or tails.
